title: Skin unavaliable
body: The one day I wnted to buy recon teemo and its unavaliable, why is that.

replies.body:
Hey there!

Recon Teemo was part of the Legacy skins that are being taken from the store. The event that brought the Legacy skins back for a short time has already ended, which is probably why you can't buy this skin anymore. You can read more about The Heist event [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/skins-still-vault-hours-being-stolen).
